stepOne.title: 1. Customer Info
stepOne.subtitle: We require some info from you to generate a personalized bitcoin address.
stepOne.name: Name

stepTwo.title: 2. Wallet Setup
stepTwo.subtitle: Generate your public key and paste it into the text field below.

stepThree.title: 3. Purchase Amount
stepThree.subtitle: How many Atoms do you wish to purchase?

stepFour.title: 4. Payment
stepFour.subtitle: Make the payment to the deposit address below. Atoms will arrive in your crowdfund wallet within minutes.
